```{r}
# Sociodemographic characteristics
data <- data %>% 
  mutate(
    income_num = case_when(
      INCOME == 1 ~ 12500,
      INCOME == 2 ~ 30000,
      INCOME == 3 ~ 42500,
      INCOME == 4 ~ 62500,
      INCOME == 5 ~ 87500,
      INCOME == 6 ~ 125000,
      INCOME == 7 ~ 175000,
      INCOME == 8 ~ 250000,
      TRUE ~ NA_real_
    ),
    fpg = case_when( # Federal poverty guidelines
      year == 2022 & state != "Alaska" & state != "Hawaii" ~ 100 * (income_num / (8870 + 4720 * THHLD_NUMPER)),
      year == 2022 & state == "Alaska" ~ 100 * (income_num / (11090 + 5900 * THHLD_NUMPER)),
      year == 2022 & state == "Hawaii" ~ 100 * (income_num / (10200 + 5430 * THHLD_NUMPER)),
      year == 2023 & state != "Alaska" & state != "Hawaii" ~ 100 * (income_num / (9440 + 5140 * THHLD_NUMPER)),
      year == 2023 & state == "Alaska" ~ 100 * (income_num / (11780 + 6430 * THHLD_NUMPER)),
      year == 2023 & state == "Hawaii" ~ 100 * (income_num / (10860 + 5910 * THHLD_NUMPER)),
      year == 2024 & state != "Alaska" & state != "Hawaii" ~ 100 * (income_num / (9680 + 5380 * THHLD_NUMPER)),
      year == 2024 & state == "Alaska" ~ 100 * (income_num / (12080 + 6730 * THHLD_NUMPER)),
      year == 2024 & state == "Hawaii" ~ 100 * (income_num / (11120 + 6190 * THHLD_NUMPER)),
      TRUE ~ NA_real_
    ),
    age = year - TBIRTH_YEAR,
    age_cat = case_when(
      age >= 18 & age <= 24 ~ "18-24",
      age >= 25 & age <= 34 ~ "25-34",
      age >= 35 & age <= 44 ~ "35-44",
      age >= 45 & age <= 54 ~ "45-54",
      age >= 55 & age <= 64 ~ "55-64",
      age >= 65 ~ ">65",
      TRUE ~ NA_character_
    ),
    sex_cat = case_when(
      EGENID_BIRTH == 1 ~ "1.Male",
      EGENID_BIRTH == 2 ~ "2.Female",
      TRUE ~ NA_character_
    ),
    race_cat = case_when(
      RRACE == 1 ~ "White",
      RRACE == 2 ~ "Black",
      RRACE == 3 ~ "Asian",
      RRACE == 4 ~ "Other",
      TRUE ~ NA_character_
    ),
    race_cat = case_when( # Note: Hispanic ethnicity overrides all other race variables
      RHISPANIC == 1 ~ race_cat,
      RHISPANIC == 2 ~ "Hispanic",
      TRUE ~ race_cat
    ),
    edu_cat = case_when(
      EEDUC == 1 ~ "Less than high school",
      EEDUC == 2 ~ "Some high school",
      EEDUC == 3 ~ "High school graduate",
      EEDUC == 4 ~ "Some college",
      EEDUC == 5 ~ "Associates degree",
      EEDUC == 6 ~ "Bachelors degree",
      EEDUC == 7 ~ "Graduate degree",
      TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  )

      date < ymd("2023-04-01") ~ FALSE,
      date > ymd("2023-07-31") ~ TRUE,
      TRUE ~ NA
    ),
    intervention = case_when(
      state == "Georgia" ~ TRUE,
      state == "South Dakota" ~ FALSE,
      # state %in% c("Alabama", "Florida", "Texas", "Mississippi", "South Carolina") ~ FALSE,
      TRUE ~ NA
    ),
    group = case_when(
      state == "Georgia" ~ "Georgia",
      state == "South Dakota" ~ "South Dakota",
      state %in% c("Alabama", "Florida", "Texas", "Mississippi", "South Carolina") ~ "Medicaid Non-expansion States",
      TRUE ~ NA
    ),
    group_factor = factor(group, levels = c("Georgia", "South Dakota", "Medicaid Non-expansion States"))
  )
```

# Create survey object
```{r}
survey <- data %>%
  as_survey_rep(
    repweights = dplyr::matches("PWEIGHT[0-9]+"),
    weights = PWEIGHT_divided,
    type = "successive-difference",
    mse = TRUE
  )
```

# Select sample
```{r}
sample <- survey %>%
  subset(
    intervention %in% c(FALSE, TRUE) & # Intervention or control group
    # (intervention1 %in% c(FALSE, TRUE) | intervention2 %in% c(FALSE, TRUE) | intervention3 %in% c(FALSE, TRUE)) & # Intervention or control group
      age >= 19 & age <= 64 & # 19-64 years old
      fpg <= 100 & # Income up to 100% FPL
      not_missing_hi == 1 & # Health insurance not missing
      not_missing_employment == 1 # Employment not missing
      
  )
```

# Plot data - quarters
```{r}
# Medicaid
medicaid_quarter <- svyby(~medicaid, ~quarter_factor + intervention, sample,
                       svymean, vartype = "se", na.rm = TRUE) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  rename(
    percentage = medicaid,
    se = se
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    percentage = percentage * 100,
    se = se * 100,
    lower = pmax(percentage - 1.96 * se, 0),
    upper = pmin(percentage + 1.96 * se, 100)
  ) %>%
  filter(quarter_factor != "2023 Q2")

policy_change_x <- which(levels(medicaid_quarter$quarter_factor) == "2023 Q2") + (1/3)

medicaid_quarter_plot <- ggplot(medicaid_quarter, aes(x = quarter_factor, y = percentage, color = intervention, group = intervention)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = lower, ymax = upper), width = 0.2) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = policy_change_x, linetype = "dashed", color = "black") +  # Policy change in July 2023
  labs(
    x = "Date",
    y = "Medicaid coverage, %"
  ) +
  scale_x_discrete(labels = c("Mar 2022", "Jun 2022", "Sep 2022", "Dec 2022", 
                              "Mar 2023", "Jun 2023", "Sep 2023", "Dec 2023",
                              "Mar 2024", "Jun 2024", "Sep 2024"),
                   drop = FALSE) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1", labels = c("Medicaid Non-expansion States", "Georgia")) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.title = element_blank()
  ) +
  ylim(0, 100)

medicaid_quarter_plot
```

# Create DID table
```{r}
# Define function to fill in diff-in-diff table
gen_did_tbl <- function(outcome_var, survey_design, z_value = 1.96) {
  # Tabulate the average percentages in the pre and post time periods for intervention == TRUE
  tbl_t <- svyby(as.formula(paste0("~", outcome_var)), ~post, subset(survey_design, intervention == TRUE), svymean, vartype = c("ci"), na.rm = TRUE)

  # Tabulate the average percentages in the pre and post time periods for intervention == FALSE
  tbl_c <- svyby(as.formula(paste0("~", outcome_var)), ~post, subset(survey_design, intervention == FALSE), svymean, vartype = c("ci"), na.rm = TRUE)

  # Extract the means and confidence intervals for intervention == TRUE
  pre_mean_t <- tbl_t[tbl_t$post == FALSE, outcome_var]
  ci_pre_low_t <- tbl_t[tbl_t$post == FALSE, "ci_l"]
  ci_pre_upp_t <- tbl_t[tbl_t$post == FALSE, "ci_u"]
  post_mean_t <- tbl_t[tbl_t$post == TRUE, outcome_var]
  ci_post_low_t <- tbl_t[tbl_t$post == TRUE, "ci_l"]
  ci_post_upp_t <- tbl_t[tbl_t$post == TRUE, "ci_u"]

  # Convert to percentage points for intervention == TRUE
  pre_mean_percent_t <- pre_mean_t * 100
  ci_pre_low_percent_t <- ci_pre_low_t * 100
  ci_pre_upp_percent_t <- ci_pre_upp_t * 100
  post_mean_percent_t <- post_mean_t * 100
  ci_post_low_percent_t <- ci_post_low_t * 100
  ci_post_upp_percent_t <- ci_post_upp_t * 100

  # Calculate the difference for intervention == TRUE
  diff_mean_t <- post_mean_t - pre_mean_t

  # Calculate the standard error of the difference for intervention == TRUE
  diff_se_t <- sqrt((((tbl_t[tbl_t$post == TRUE, "ci_u"] - post_mean_t))/z_value)^2 +
                    (((pre_mean_t - tbl_t[tbl_t$post == FALSE, "ci_l"]))/z_value)^2)

  # Calculate the confidence interval for intervention == TRUE
  ci_diff_low_t <- diff_mean_t - z_value * diff_se_t
  ci_diff_upp_t <- diff_mean_t + z_value * diff_se_t

  # Convert to percentage points for intervention == TRUE
  diff_mean_percent_t <- diff_mean_t * 100
  ci_diff_low_percent_t <- ci_diff_low_t * 100
  ci_diff_upp_percent_t <- ci_diff_upp_t * 100

  # Extract the means and confidence intervals for intervention == FALSE
  pre_mean_c <- tbl_c[tbl_c$post == FALSE, outcome_var]
  ci_pre_low_c <- tbl_c[tbl_c$post == FALSE, "ci_l"]
  ci_pre_upp_c <- tbl_c[tbl_c$post == FALSE, "ci_u"]
  post_mean_c <- tbl_c[tbl_c$post == TRUE, outcome_var]
  ci_post_low_c <- tbl_c[tbl_c$post == TRUE, "ci_l"]
  ci_post_upp_c <- tbl_c[tbl_c$post == TRUE, "ci_u"]

  # Convert to percentage points for intervention == FALSE
  pre_mean_percent_c <- pre_mean_c * 100
  ci_pre_low_percent_c <- ci_pre_low_c * 100
  ci_pre_upp_percent_c <- ci_pre_upp_c * 100
  post_mean_percent_c <- post_mean_c * 100
  ci_post_low_percent_c <- ci_post_low_c * 100
  ci_post_upp_percent_c <- ci_post_upp_c * 100

  # Calculate the difference for intervention == FALSE
  diff_mean_c <- post_mean_c - pre_mean_c

  # Calculate p value for intervention == TRUE
  did_ttest_t <- svyttest(as.formula(paste0(outcome_var, " ~ post")), design = subset(survey_design, intervention == TRUE))
  did_pval_t <- formatC(did_ttest_t$p.value, format = "f", digits = 4)

  # Calculate the standard error of the difference for intervention == FALSE
  diff_se_c <- sqrt((((tbl_c[tbl_c$post == TRUE, "ci_u"] - post_mean_c))/z_value)^2 +
                    (((pre_mean_c - tbl_c[tbl_c$post == FALSE, "ci_l"]))/z_value)^2)

  # Calculate the confidence interval for intervention == FALSE
  ci_diff_low_c <- diff_mean_c - z_value * diff_se_c
  ci_diff_upp_c <- diff_mean_c + z_value * diff_se_c

  # Convert to percentage points for intervention == FALSE
  diff_mean_percent_c <- diff_mean_c * 100
  ci_diff_low_percent_c <- ci_diff_low_c * 100
  ci_diff_upp_percent_c <- ci_diff_upp_c * 100

  # Calculate p value for intervention == FALSE
  did_ttest_c <- svyttest(as.formula(paste0(outcome_var, " ~ post")), design = subset(survey_design, intervention == FALSE))
  did_pval_c <- formatC(did_ttest_c$p.value, format = "f", digits = 4)

  # Print the results for intervention == TRUE
  cat("Intervention group:\n")
  cat(paste0("Pre period mean: ", formatC(pre_mean_percent_t, format = "f", digits = 1), " (",
             formatC(ci_pre_low_percent_t, format = "f", digits = 1), ", ",
             formatC(ci_pre_upp_percent_t, format = "f", digits = 1), ")\n"))
  cat(paste0("Post period mean: ", formatC(post_mean_percent_t, format = "f", digits = 1), " (",
             formatC(ci_post_low_percent_t, format = "f", digits = 1), ", ",
             formatC(ci_post_upp_percent_t, format = "f", digits = 1), ")\n"))
  cat(paste0("Difference: ", formatC(diff_mean_percent_t, format = "f", digits = 1), " (",
             formatC(ci_diff_low_percent_t, format = "f", digits = 1), ", ",
             formatC(ci_diff_upp_percent_t, format = "f", digits = 1), ")\n"))
  cat(paste0("P value: ", formatC(did_pval_t, format = "f", digits = 4), "\n\n"))

  # Print the results for intervention == FALSE
  cat("Control group:\n")
  cat(paste0("Pre period mean: ", formatC(pre_mean_percent_c, format = "f", digits = 1), " (",
             formatC(ci_pre_low_percent_c, format = "f", digits = 1), ", ",
             formatC(ci_pre_upp_percent_c, format = "f", digits = 1), ")\n"))
  cat(paste0("Post period mean: ", formatC(post_mean_percent_c, format = "f", digits = 1), " (",
             formatC(ci_post_low_percent_c, format = "f", digits = 1), ", ",
             formatC(ci_post_upp_percent_c, format = "f", digits = 1), ")\n"))
  cat(paste0("Difference: ", formatC(diff_mean_percent_c, format = "f", digits = 1), " (",
             formatC(ci_diff_low_percent_c, format = "f", digits = 1), ", ",
             formatC(ci_diff_upp_percent_c, format = "f", digits = 1), ")\n"))
  cat(paste0("P value: ", formatC(did_pval_c, format = "f", digits = 4), "\n\n"))
}

# Run on outcomes
gen_did_tbl("medicaid", sample)
gen_did_tbl("esi", sample)
gen_did_tbl("uninsured", sample)
gen_did_tbl("employed", sample)
```

# Playground
```{r}
sample_raw <- data %>%
  mutate(
    intervention = case_when(
      state == "Georgia" ~ TRUE,
      # state == "South Dakota" ~ FALSE,
      state %in% c("Alabama", "Florida", "Texas", "Mississippi", "South Carolina") ~ FALSE,
      TRUE ~ NA
    )
  ) %>%
  filter(
    intervention %in% c(FALSE, TRUE) & # Intervention or control group
      age >= 19 & age <= 64 & # 19-64 years old
      fpg <= 100 & # Income up to 100% FPL
      not_missing_hi == TRUE & # Health insurance not missing
      not_missing_employment == TRUE # Employment not missing
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    state_factor = as.factor(state),
    date_factor = as.factor(date)
  )

sample_raw_pre <- sample_raw %>%
  filter(
    post == 0
  )

# Parallel trends
## Medicaid
medicaid_pttest <- lm(medicaid ~ intervention * date + state_factor + date_factor, data = sample_raw_pre, weights = PWEIGHT_divided)
medicaid_pttest_se <- vcovCL(medicaid_pttest, cluster = ~ state_factor)
medicaid_pttest_coef <- coeftest(medicaid_pttest, vcov = medicaid_pttest_se)
medicaid_pttest_coef
confint(medicaid_pttest_coef)

uninsured_unadj_se <- vcovCL(uninsured_unadj, cluster = ~ state_factor)
uninsured_unadj_coef <- coeftest(uninsured_unadj, vcov = uninsured_unadj_se)
uninsured_unadj_coef
confint(uninsured_unadj_coef)

employed_unadj <- lm(employed ~ intervention * post + state_factor + date_factor, data = sample_raw, weights = PWEIGHT_divided)
employed_unadj_se <- vcovCL(employed_unadj, cluster = ~ state_factor)
employed_unadj_coef <- coeftest(employed_unadj, vcov = employed_unadj_se)
employed_unadj_coef
confint(employed_unadj_coef)
```
